participant_1.background:
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.
i like to donate time at the local animal shelter.
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.

participant_2.background:
I like to wear zebra print to make myself feel younger.
i love my work and just got promoted.
I've had to rescue people who were caught in riptides.
I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.
my dad works in the automotive industry.

content.text: Hi, I'm [participant_1]
Hello, I'm [participant_2]
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a tour guide at the Grand Canyon
What's that like?
It's a lot of fun! I get to meet people from all over the world and share my love of the Grand Canyon with them
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to visit the Grand Canyon
You should! It's one of the most beautiful places in the world
I'm sure it is! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the way it's so different from anywhere else I've ever been
I can imagine! It's definitely on my bucket list
You should definitely put it at the top of your list!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation
No problem! What do you do for work?
I'm a dog trainer
Oh, that's so cool! I love dogs
Me too! They're the best
I bet! So, what are some of the things you like to do in your free time?
I like to go hiking, biking, and kayaking. I also like to read and cook
Hiking sounds fun! I've never been kayaking, but it looks like a lot of fun
It is! It's a great way to see the Grand Canyon
I bet! What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different genres, but my favorites are historical fiction and mystery
I like historical fiction too! I've never read a mystery, but I've always been curious about them
You should definitely give them a try! They're a lot of fun
I will! Thanks for the recommendation
No problem
